start.copyStart: TAKE A SELFIE AND BE PART OF LUNAY’S VIDEO
start.subCopyStart: Register and you could win a virtual Meet & Greet with Lunay and more amazing prizes.
registerInfo.copyCheckbox1: I would like to receive exciting product and event news from Toyota.
registerInfo.copyCheckbox2: I would like to be contacted by my local Toyota dealer for a test drive and more information about purchasing or leasing a new Toyota vehicle.
shareExperience.copyLunay: You’re now a part of LUNAY’s music video!
shareExperience.copyLunaySpan: Don’t forget to download it and share with the world. You might win a virtual meeting with Lunay and other amazing prizes.
shareExperience.copyFooter2: you are accepting the Terms and conditions.
shareExperience.shareMessage: I’m in Lunay’s new music video “Todo o Nada” with Lunay and Corolla Apex. Check it out and create yours here:
join.copyJoin: CHECK OUT YOUR FRIEND´S VIDEO AND MAKE YOUR OWN.
join.subCopyJoin: Take a selfie to be a part of LUNAY’s video.
notAvailable.copyNotAvailable: SORRY, THIS EXPERIENCE IS NOT AVAILABLE IN YOUR COUNTRY.
